title: Malus sikkimensis
text: Malus sikkimensis is a rare species of <a href="Malus">apple</a> known by the common name Sikkim crabapple. Its <a href="Pinyin">Chinese</a> name is xi jin hai tang (锡金海棠). It is native to <a href="China">China</a>, <a href="Nepal">Nepal</a>, <a href="Bhutan">Bhutan</a>, and part of <a href="India">India</a>, where it is threatened due to <a href="loss%20of%20habitat">loss of habitat</a>. It bears white and pink flowers and dark red fruit.
